messages.content: User: Please classify whether this needs a connector. I need help with template_request â€” a checklist for review the draft brief. Assistant: Got it. Do you want me to just label it or add a short rationale? User: Label and a quick rationale, please.
Label: connector_needed=False. If it requires an app action, mark connector_needed true; otherwise false. Bad: guess the label. Good: map the intent to connector use.
